string.name: verifying
string.translation_description: Progress dialog text while phone number is being verified

string.name: invalid_phone_number
string.translation_description: Inline error when phone number entered is invalid

string.name: error_too_many_attempts
string.translation_description: Error message when the phone number has been used too many times

resources.string: This phone number has been used too many times

string.name: error_quota_exceeded
string.translation_description: Error message when the Firebase project's quota has been exceeded.

resources.string: There was a problem verifying your phone number

string.name: incorrect_code_dialog_body
string.translation_description: Inline error when incorrect sms verification code is being used to verify

string.name: error_session_expired
string.translation_description: Error message when SMS confirmation code has expired.
